trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>傳回以唯讀模式的控制項; 不過，您可以保留<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>中編輯控制項，或插入模式下，此屬性設定為適當的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的模式值。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| This property is commonly used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records.
trans-unit.target: |模式 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式，可讓使用者更新記錄的值。 | |`FormViewMode.Insert`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式下，可讓使用者將新記錄新增至資料來源。 | |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於唯讀模式，這是一般顯示模式。 | 這個屬性通常是使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項對單一用途，例如只插入或編輯資料錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FormViewMode.ReadOnly" name="FormViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_FormViewMode.ReadOnly" name="FormViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 刪除現有的記錄中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制從資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the DeleteItem method to programmatically delete the current record in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DeleteItem 方法來以程式設計方式刪除在目前的記錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制從資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您要刪除目前的記錄，從外部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面時，控制項執行刪除作業所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面控制項執行刪除作業時所呼叫方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for an item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂內容的項目處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (所指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|EditItemTemplate| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Use the EditItemTemplate property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: |模式 |轉譯範本 | |----------|-----------------------| |編輯 |EditItemTemplate | |插入 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |唯讀 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| EditItemTemplate 屬性來定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: 編輯項目範本通常包含輸入的控制項和使用者更新現有的記錄，以及更新的記錄，以及取消更新作業的命令按鈕的值。

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template, first place `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方`<EditItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EditItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control.
trans-unit.target: 使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位與輸入控制項產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項自動顯示相關聯輸入控制項處於編輯模式中的 原始欄位值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When a record is updated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 更新記錄時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>自動從相關聯輸入控制項擷取更新的欄位值的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立執行內建的取消和更新作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項加入至具有範本其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: |Command button type|CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |Cancel|"Cancel"| |Update|"Update"| You can control the appearance of the item template by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |命令按鈕類型 |CommandName 值 | |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消 |"取消"| |Update |"更新"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the data row when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含資料的自訂內容資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data row when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定資料的外觀資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data row when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制資料的外觀 EditRowStyle 屬性資料列時使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式，資料列會顯示由指定使用者定義的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<EditRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data row when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，表示樣式的資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項處於編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row displayed when the data source bound to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定的空白資料列時，資料來源繫結至顯示外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項並未包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the empty data row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EmptyDataRowStyle 屬性來控制中的空白資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄時，會顯示空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<EmptyDataRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> ，可讓您設定空白資料列的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者定義的內容，來轉譯時的空白資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性來定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定空白資料列的自訂範本，先將`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<EmptyDataTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，設定為空的資料列使用內建的 UI<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>和 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會設定、 EmptyDataTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含空白資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定来顯示空的資料列中的文字呈現時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項所繫結至資料來源不包含任何記錄。

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: 空白資料列會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制當繫結至控制項的資料來源不包含任何記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EmptyDataText 屬性來指定要顯示空的資料列中的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制的空白資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)，空白資料列，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 EmptyDataText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: 要在空白資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否驗證程式控制項將會處理發生在進行插入或更新作業的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證程式控制項將會處理或更新作業; 在插入期間發生的例外狀況，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Makes certain that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to data when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 讓特定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項所繫結時適當資料。

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to make certain that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is bound to data when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: EnsureDataBound 方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>類別，以確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項所繫結時適當資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method is usually called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A> method to bind the control to the data source when the data-bound control is not yet bound, but requires data binding.
trans-unit.target: EnsureDataBound 方法通常稱為期間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>方法，以將控制項繫結至資料來源時還未繫結的資料繫結控制項，但需要的資料繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of the method has been overridden to prevent data binding from occurring when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免發生資料繫結已覆寫這個版本的方法時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the data row and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料列內宣告的每個欄位的值，並將它們儲存在指定<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the data row.
trans-unit.target: ExtractRowValues 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來擷取資料列內宣告的每個欄位的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Because the data row displays a different template based on the current mode, this method retrieves only the field values declared in the template that corresponds to the current mode.
trans-unit.target: 由於資料列會顯示不同的範本，根據目前的模式，則這個方法會擷取只宣告對應於目前的模式的範本中的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the available modes and the corresponding templates.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示可用的模式和對應的範本。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template| |----------|--------------| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| You can specify whether the extracted values include the key field or fields by using the `includeKeys` parameter.
trans-unit.target: |模式 |範本 | |----------|--------------| |插入 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |編輯 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |唯讀 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| 您可以指定擷取的值使用是否包含索引鍵欄位`includeKeys`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values of the current data item.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref>用來儲存目前的資料項目的欄位值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include key fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包含索引鍵欄位。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref>物件，代表頁尾資料列中的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterRow 屬性，若要以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件，代表頁尾資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FooterRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > FooterRow 屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項建立頁尾資料列中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作頁尾資料列，例如當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: 後必須執行 FooterRow 屬性所做的任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制會覆寫任何變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref>頁尾資料列中的表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterStyle 屬性來控制頁尾資料列中的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `FooterStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<FooterStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `FooterStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示頁尾資料列中的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁尾資料列中的使用者定義內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or FooterTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>或 FooterTemplate 屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by using the FooterTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 FooterTemplate 屬性頁尾資料列的檔案，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the footer row, first place `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定頁尾資料列的自訂範本，先將`<FooterTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<FooterTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字頁尾資料列中藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> and FooterTemplate properties are set, the FooterTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>和 FooterTemplate 屬性會設定、 FooterTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>包含頁尾資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the FooterText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾資料列會顯示在底部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時 FooterText 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterText property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FooterText 屬性來指定要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制頁尾資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI) 頁尾資料列設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the FooterText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 FooterText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: 要在頁尾資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定格線樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用格線屬性來指定格線樣式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的樣式。

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: |樣式 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|不顯示格線。 | |`GridLines.Horizontal`|顯示水平格線。 | |`GridLines.Vertical`|顯示垂直格線。 | |`GridLines.Both`|顯示水平和垂直格線。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.None" name="GridLines.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.None" name="GridLines.None" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref>物件，表示中的標頭資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the header row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderRow 屬性，若要以程式設計方式存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件，表示標頭資料列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HeaderRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > HeaderRow 屬性之後，才可被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項建立中的標頭資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於您需要以程式設計方式操作標頭資料列時，例如，當加入自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the HeaderRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: 後必須執行 HeaderRow 屬性所做的任何修改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項已呈現，否則<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項會覆寫任何變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref>表示中的標頭資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定中的標頭資料列的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderStyle 屬性來控制中的標頭資料列的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<HeaderStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中的標頭資料列的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者定義的內容中的標頭資料列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or HeaderTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>或 HeaderTemplate 屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by using the HeaderTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 HeaderTemplate 屬性標頭資料列的檔案，以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the header row, first place `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定標頭資料列的自訂範本，請先將`<HeaderTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<HeaderTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制標頭資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以只顯示文字標頭列中藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> and HeaderTemplate properties are set, the HeaderTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>、 HeaderTemplate 屬性會設定 HeaderTemplate 屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the header row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>包含標頭資料列的自訂內容。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the header row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示的標頭資料列中的文字<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the HeaderText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 標頭資料列會顯示在頂端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>負責控制何時 HeaderText 或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to specify the text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HeaderText 屬性來指定要在標頭資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制標頭資料列的樣式，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以定義您自己的自訂使用者介面 (UI) 標頭資料列藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>而不是這個屬性的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the HeaderText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果這兩個 HeaderText 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性會優先。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: 要在標頭資料列中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定水平對齊<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>頁面上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的水平對齊 HorizontalAlign 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>頁面內控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的水平對齊樣式。

trans-unit.source: |HorizontalAlign value|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: |HorizontalAlign 值 |描述 | |---------------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|尚未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項的水平對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項是在頁面上靠左對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項置於頁面。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項是在頁面上靠右對齊。 | |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項對齊頁面的左、 右邊界。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates the pager row for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 會建立頁面巡覽區列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create the pager row.
trans-unit.target: InitializePager 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來建立頁面巡覽區列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that contains the navigation controls using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> object contained in the `pagedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>物件，其中包含使用之屬性的導覽控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>中所含物件`pagedDataSource`參數。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The cell is then added to the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 資料格就會加入至指定的資料列`row`參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that contains the pager row.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref>包含頁面巡覽區資料列。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that contains the data for the current page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> ，其中包含目前頁面的資料。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The InitializeRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to initialize the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: InitializeRow 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>初始化指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is initialized based on the row type and row state specified by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件初始化的資料列型別和所指定的資料列狀態其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The appropriate content is then added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: 接著會加入適當的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how each row type is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每個資料列型別初始化的方式。

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |Data row|The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> property.| |Empty data row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: |資料列型別 |描述 | |--------------|-----------------| |資料列 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>，或者<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>屬性都會加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>物件，視<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>屬性的值而定。 | |空白資料列 |值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>屬性或內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>依據設定屬性的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| |Footer row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定這兩個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>屬性會優先使用。 | |頁尾資料列 |值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>屬性或內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>依據設定屬性的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| |Header row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定這兩個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>屬性會優先使用。 | |標頭資料列 |值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>屬性或內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>依據設定屬性的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| > [!NOTE] > This method does not initialize the pager row.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定這兩個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>屬性會優先使用。 | > [!NOTE] > 這個方法不會初始化頁面巡覽區列。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立頁面巡覽列，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref>初始化。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的記錄插入資料來源中。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, use the InsertItem method to programmatically insert the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在插入模式下，請使用 InsertItem 方法來以程式設計方式插入資料來源中的 目前的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to insert the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常使用於您需要插入目前的記錄從外部<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項，例如來自不同頁面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control must be in insert mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項必須在插入模式下呼叫，否則這個方法時<xref:System.Web.HttpException>就會擲回。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定是否要將頁面驗證執行插入作業之前，請使用`causesValidation`參數。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法也會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要執行頁面驗證時呼叫的方法;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is not in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項不是在插入模式。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is null.
trans-unit.target: -或- <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>物件相關聯<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項為 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for an item in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在插入模式下的自訂內容的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項呈現不同的範本，根據目前的控制項模式的資料列 (所指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>屬性)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示每個模式所用的範本。

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Insert|InsertItemTemplate| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Use the InsertItemTemplate property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: |模式 |轉譯範本 | |----------|-----------------------| |編輯 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |插入 |上 | |唯讀 |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| 使用 [上] 屬性來定義您自己的使用者介面 (UI)，資料列時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The insert item template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for the new record, as well as command buttons to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 插入項目範本通常包含使用者輸入新的記錄的值，以及命令按鈕來插入記錄，及取消插入作業的輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template, first place `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定自訂範本，第一個地方`<InsertItemTemplate>`標記的開頭和結尾標記之間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您可以列出範本的開頭和結尾之間的內容`<InsertItemTemplate>`標記。

trans-unit.source: By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control.
trans-unit.target: 使用雙向繫結運算式，您可以將欄位與輸入控制項產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When a record is inserted, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 插入一筆記錄、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項自動擷取的欄位值相關聯輸入控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)。

trans-unit.source: To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立執行內建的取消和插入作業的命令按鈕，將命令按鈕控制項加入至具有範本其`CommandName`下表中列出的屬性設定為其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: |Command button type|CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |Cancel|"Cancel"| |Insert|"Insert"| You can control the appearance of the item template by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |命令按鈕類型 |CommandName 值 | |-------------------------|-----------------------| |取消 |"取消"| |插入 |"插入"| 您可以使用來控制的項目範本外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the data row when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含資料的自訂內容資料列時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 null，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面時，控制項執行插入作業所呼叫的方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面控制項執行插入作業時所呼叫方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>物件，可讓您設定中的資料列的外觀<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制當控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: Use the InsertRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data row when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制資料的外觀 InsertRowStyle 屬性資料列時使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項是在插入模式下，資料列會顯示所指定的使用者定義內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的。不過，您可以設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>它所傳回的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以設定的屬性，以宣告方式使用下列方法之一:-將屬性放在開頭標記<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項在表單中的`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是屬性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>物件 (例如， `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<InsertRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -巢狀`<InsertRowStyle>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 屬性也可以設定以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常見的設定通常包括自訂背景色彩、 前景色彩和字型屬性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>表示中的資料列的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制當控制項處於插入模式。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結中的欄位<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the control.
trans-unit.target: IsBindableType 方法是 helper 方法，由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項來決定指定的資料類型是否可以繫結至控制項中的欄位。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control supports the following data types: - All primitive data types, such as <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int32>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項支援下列資料類型:-所有基本資料類型，例如<xref:System.Boolean>， <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.Int32>，依此類推。</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.DateTime> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Guid> - <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.DateTime> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Guid> - <xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Decimal></xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the data type to check.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>，代表要檢查的資料類型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料類型可以繫結中的欄位<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項等控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生於內按鈕<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 中的按鈕時，會引發 ItemCommand 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項也可以叫用的某些內建控制項的功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這些作業之一，設定`CommandName`下表中的值的其中一個按鈕的屬性。

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |CommandName 值 |描述 | |-----------------------|-----------------| |"取消"|取消編輯或插入作業，並傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項以指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"刪除"|刪除現有的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>事件。 | |"編輯"|將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制項處於編輯模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Insert"|Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"插入"|將目前的記錄插入資料來源中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.| |"New"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>事件。 | |"新增"|將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>在插入模式下的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"頁面"|執行分頁作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 設定`CommandArgument`"First"，"持續 」 按鈕、 下一步 」、 「 Prev"，或執行頁碼，以指定的分頁作業類型的屬性。
